subject: National Invitation Tournament
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Karvel Anderson, the Northeast Conference player of the year, scored a game-high 38 points as Robert Morris took a 19-2 lead and beat St. John’s, a No. 1 seed, in the N.I.T.
snippet: Karvel Anderson, the Northeast Conference player of the year, scored a game-high 38 points as Robert Morris took a 19-2 lead and beat St. John’s, a No. 1 seed, in the N.I.T.
